sqls.sql: UPDATE me_da_act2 SET da_act_id = @da_act_id, da_act_status = @da_act_status, da_act_no = @da_act_no, da_act_name = @da_act_name, show_after = @show_after, da_act_status_desc = @da_act_status_desc, da_act_close = @da_act_close, da_act_after = @da_act_after, new_fb_start_id = @new_fb_start_id, new_da_counter = @new_da_counter, da_act_background_color1 = @da_act_background_color1, da_act_background_color2 = @da_act_background_color2, da_act_background_image1 = @da_act_background_image1, da_act_background_image2 = @da_act_background_image2, da_act_rmk10 = @da_act_rmk10, da_act_rmk20 = @da_act_rmk20, da_act_rmk30 = @da_act_rmk30, da_act_rmk40 = @da_act_rmk40, crt_user = @crt_user, crt_host = @crt_host, crt_time = @crt_time, upd_user = @upd_user, upd_host = @upd_host, upd_time = @upd_time, crt_user_no = @crt_user_no, crt_user_name = @crt_user_name, upd_user_no = @upd_user_no, upd_user_name = @upd_user_name, is_wkc_ex = @is_wkc_ex, act_is_parallel = @act_is_parallel, act_lang_str_id = @act_lang_str_id, act_control = @act_control, act_control_para = @act_control_para, act_condation = @act_condation, exec_procedure_after = @exec_procedure_after, da_act_before = @da_act_before;
